import{client,refreshClient}from"./client";import{REFRESH_TOKEN}from"../config";// 유저 로그인
export var userLogin=function userLogin(_ref){var userid=_ref.userid,password=_ref.password;return client.post("/auth/login",{userid:userid,password:password});};export var userRegister=function userRegister(_ref2){var userid=_ref2.userid,password=_ref2.password,name=_ref2.name;return client.post("/auth/register",{userid:userid,password:password,name:name});};export var refresh=function refresh(){return refreshClient.post("/auth/refresh",{refresh:localStorage.getItem(REFRESH_TOKEN)});};
